elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Name goods/groups of goods that are sorted according to the following principles:

elements.name: question1
elements.title: FIFO:
elements.correctAnswer: Non-food items; goods affected by depreciation over time

elements.name: question4
elements.title: FEFO:
elements.correctAnswer: Foodstuffs; goods with an expiration date

elements.name: question2
elements.title: LIFO:
elements.correctAnswer: Building materials such as gravel, stones, etc.; heavy objects that have no expiration date and are difficult to move (concrete slabs, iron bars, etc.)

elements.name: question3
elements.title: What principles do you use to store goods in your training company? Are there differences depending on the product group? If so, which ones?
